UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational design of hyperstable antibacterial peptides for food preservation.
Literature.Author: Vishweshwaraiah YL, Acharya A, Hegde VV, Prakash B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 13932(MIC=>150µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>150µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12900(MIC=>150µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=>150µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum MCC 2112(MIC=>150µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 9844(MIC=>150µg/ml)
